snippet: NEWMAN--Sydell (Schneiderman), died peacefully at age 100. Predeceased by beloved husband David and cherished sisters Doris Berkowitz and Jeanne Singer. Loved and admired by daughters Barbara (Bernard), Nancy (Henry); grandchildren Matthew (Gillian), Susan (Andrew), Benjamin, Adam (Shana), Justin (Alexa); great-grandchildren Sasha, Jane, Charlotte, David, Keira, Marie. Contributions in her memory can be made to her not-for-profit residence: Carnegie East House, c/o Joseph Girven, Director, 1844 Second Ave., NYC, NY 10128. 1/3
lead_paragraph: NEWMAN--Sydell (Schneiderman), died peacefully at age 100. Predeceased by beloved husband David and cherished sisters Doris Berkowitz and Jeanne Singer. Loved and admired by daughters Barbara (Bernard), Nancy (Henry); grandchildren Matthew (Gillian), Susan (Andrew), Benjamin, Adam (Shana), Justin (Alexa); great-grandchildren Sasha, Jane, Charlotte, David, Keira, Marie. Contributions in her memory can be made to her not-for-profit residence: Carnegie East House, c/o Joseph Girven, Director, 1844 Second Ave., NYC, NY 10128. 1/3
